column1: '''''Mythlore'' 69''' is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal.

The article "Gondolinic Runes" by [[Paul Nolan Hyde]] includes a facsimile of a manuscript by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] followed by a lengthy analysis (a response to the article was published in [[Mythlore 70
column2: ''Mythlore'' 70]], by [[Carl F. Hostetter]]).<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/languages.php Languages and Alphabets] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net Tolkienbooks.net] (accessed 27 August 2011)</ref>
